NAME: Warrior Fairy
DESC: Raise Echelon's Damage by 20% and Rate of Fire by 10% for 20 seconds in the next battle, does not stack.

NAME: Fury Fairy
DESC: Raise Echelon's Accuracy by 50% and Crit Rate by 25% for 20 seconds in next battle, does not stack.

NAME: Armor Fairy
DESC: Raise Echelon's Shotgun units' armor by up to 50%

NAME: Shield Fairy
DESC: Deploy a shield for each submachine gun in the echelon for the next battle, each shield taking a maximum of 150 damage.

NAME: Defense Fairy
DESC: Reduce Echelon's Damage taken by 30% for every battle in one turn for 20 seconds.

NAME: Taunt Fairy
DESC: Deploy a decoy dummy with 1600 HP in front of your echelon, drawing fire of enemies in front of it.

NAME: Sniper Fairy
DESC: Aim for the enemy with the highest HP and deal 20000 damage to it in the next battle.

NAME: Artillery Fairy
DESC: Fires a mortar shell in the next battle. Deals up to 1200 damage to enemy units within a 2.5 yard radius.

NAME: Airstrike Fairy
DESC: Launches airstrike at the start of the next battle, deals 500 damage to all enemy units.

NAME: Reinforcement Fairy
DESC: Provides 1 dummy link for the T-doll with the lowest health in the echelon. Also provides a 10% evasion bonus for 20 seconds for that echelon for all battles in the same turn.

NAME: Parachute Fairy
DESC: This echelon can airdrop to any landing zone in the map, but will receive a 40% penalty to Damage, Accuracy, Evasion, Armor, and Crit rate for two turns.

NAME: Landmine Fairy
DESC: Bury a Mine at the neighboring point where there is no enemy, this mine will stay for 2 turns and when the enemy triggers it, it will deal damage equal to 50% of the enemy's HP. Not effective against bosses.

NAME: Rocket Fairy
DESC: Deploy a rocket launcher with 3 rockets that lasts for 2 turns. When an enemy moves within 2 nodes of the launcher, that enemy takes damage equal to 20% of their HP pool. Does not work on bosses.

NAME: Construction Fairy
DESC: Builds an immovable fortress at your Echelon's position, lasts 3 turns. If your Echelon enters a battle in this spot, it will gain a 30% boost to damage, accuracy, evasion, armor and crit rate.

NAME: Command Fairy
DESC: Raise the combat experience gained by up to 25% for the next battle. DOES NOT WORK IN COMBAT SIM.

NAME: Rescue Fairy
DESC: Increases the chances of rescuing a rare T-doll from the next battle.

NAME: Illumination Fairy
DESC: Raises the Echelon's vision by 2 nodes and increases the Echelon's accuracy by 30% for the first 20 seconds of each battle. Lasts 2 turns.
